item.title: Help me please

thanks ill try it now :P[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 05:09:17 AM[/size][hr]ok i added it but when i compilited it i dident get a error but the spec bar dident sho :S[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 05:14:34 AM[/size][hr]thanks for your help i got it to work and if i need to add another void do i add it near that code from now on

@XmoparscapeX wrote:

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @XmoparscapeX XmoparscapeX
item.description:
@XmoparscapeX wrote:

do i add it in here

[code]//dillonscape SERVER 2.7

import java.io.;
import java.util.;
import java.text.;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import java.security.;

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
//all public voids

public void stayStill() {
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
public void RefreshSummonBook() {

sendQuest(“ONly build your houses at ::con”, 5450);
sendQuest("", 4439);
//Start of dillonscape modfig Construction
sendQuest("@yel@Construction Level: “+summonLevel, 3206);
sendQuest(”@yel@Construction XP: “+summonXP, 5449);
if(summonLevel >= 1)
sendQuest(”@gre@Type ::con before building", 11941);
else
sendQuest(“Only build at ::con”, 11941);
if(summonLevel >= 1)
sendQuest("@gre@Dummy", 4287);
else
sendQuest(“Dummy”, 4287);
if(summonLevel >= 5)
sendQuest("@gre@Bank booth(lvl 5)", 4288);
else
sendQuest(“Guard (lvl 5)”, 4288);
if(summonLevel >= 10)
sendQuest("@gre@Northwall (lvl 10)", 4289);
else
sendQuest(“Cool Mom227 (lvl 10)”, 4289);
if(summonLevel >= 20)
sendQuest("@gre@Southwall (lvl20)", 4290);
else
sendQuest(“ROCKS (lvl 20)”, 4290);
if(summonLevel >= 30)
sendQuest("@gre@Western wall (level 30)", 11134);
else
sendQuest(“Crate (level 30)”, 11134);
if(summonLevel >= 45)
sendQuest("@gre@Easternwall (lvl 45)", 4291);
else
sendQuest(“PussyKins (lvl 45)”, 4291);
if(summonLevel >= 60)
sendQuest("@gre@Bookcase (lvl 60)", 4292);
else
sendQuest(“EGG (lvl 60)”, 4292);
if(summonLevel >= 65)
sendQuest("@gre@lever (lvl 65)", 4293);
else
sendQuest(“Tree (lvl 65)”, 4293);
if(summonLevel >= 70)
sendQuest("@gre@Alter (lvl 70)", 4294);
else
sendQuest(“Party Pete (lvl 70)”, 4294);
if(summonLevel >= 80)
sendQuest("@gre@Webdoor (lvl 80)", 4295);
else
sendQuest(“Prego Gal (lvl 80)”, 4295);
if(summonLevel >= 85)
sendQuest("@gre@NW-SE wall (lvl 85)", 4296);
else
sendQuest(“PickAxe (lvl 85)”, 4296);
if(summonLevel >= 90)
sendQuest("@gre@NW-SW wall (lvl 90)", 8935);
else
sendQuest(“Butter Fly (lvl 90)”, 8935);
if(summonLevel >= 100)
sendQuest("@gre@Throne (lvl 100)", 4297);
else
sendQuest(“Mosquito (lvl 100)”, 4297);
if(summonLevel >= 105)
sendQuest("@gre@Suit of armour (lvl 105)", 4298);
else
sendQuest(“Shadow (lvl 105)”, 4298);
if(summonLevel >= 120)
sendQuest("@gre@Rock(lvl 120)", 4299);
else
sendQuest(“Mine Cart (lvl 120)”, 4299);
if(summonLevel >= 135)
sendQuest("@gre@Stall (lvl 135)", 4300);
else
sendQuest(“Barricade (lvl 135)”, 4300);
if(summonLevel >= 150)
sendQuest("@gre@Maple tree(lvl 150)", 4301);
else
sendQuest(“Ghast (lvl 150)”, 4301);
if(summonLevel >= 165)
sendQuest("@gre@Flaming alter(lvl 165)", 4302);
else
sendQuest(“Small Light (lvl 165)”, 4302);
if(summonLevel >= 180)
sendQuest("@gre@Upwards stairs (lvl 180)", 4303);
else
sendQuest(“Low Cloud (lvl 180)”, 4303);
if(summonLevel >= 200)
sendQuest("@gre@Downwards stairs (lvl 200)", 4304);
else
sendQuest(“Fishing Spot (lvl 200)”, 4304);
if(summonLevel >= 210)
sendQuest("@gre@Magic tree", 14872);
else
sendQuest(“Green Bird (lvl 210)”, 14872);
if(summonLevel >= 225)
sendQuest("@gre@Fence", 664);
else
sendQuest(“GHOST (lvl 225)”, 664);
if(summonLevel >= 235)
sendQuest("@gre@Spikes", 8971);
else
sendQuest(“Beetles (lvl 235)”, 8971);
if(summonLevel >= 250)
sendQuest("@gre@------------", 4306);
else
sendQuest("------------", 4306);

sendQuest("@dbl@==================", 7454);
}

public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("                        @or2@dillonscape 2.7 ", 6570);
sendFrame126("     @whi@Players On - " + players, 6664);

if (PlayerHandler.playerCount < 10) {
sendFrame126("@gre@LAg State: NONE.", 6572);
}
else if (PlayerHandler.playerCount > 11) {
sendFrame126("@gre@LAg State: Perfect.", 6572);
}
else if (PlayerHandler.playerCount > 15) {
sendFrame126("@gre@LAg State: Small lag.", 6572);
}
else if (PlayerHandler.playerCount > 29) {
sendFrame126("@gre@LAg State: Medium lag.", 6572);
}
else if (PlayerHandler.playerCount > 45) {
sendFrame126("@gre@LAg State: High Lag.", 6572);
}
else if (PlayerHandler.playerCount > 60) {
sendFrame126("@gre@LAg State: MAJOR LAG.", 6572);
}
else if (PlayerHandler.playerCount > 100) {
sendFrame126("@red@LAg State: ShUT DOWN.", 6572);
}

setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673

}[/code]
